abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
abort.no_plex_server: No Plex servers were found, be sure that the Home Assistant Plex integration is setup and working.
abort.ha_ver_unsupported: This Plex Assistant version requires Home Assistant 2021.2.0 or higher.

init.title: ❱ Plex Assistant Advanced Options
init.description:
[Documentation](https://github.com/maykar/plex_assistant)  |  [Forums](https://community.home-assistant.io/t/plex-assistant/)  |  [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/maykar/plex_assistant/blob/master/troubleshooting.md)  |  [Support Development](https://github.com/sponsors/maykar)

**Read the [Advanced Config Docs](https://github.com/maykar/plex_assistant/tree/master#advanced-configuration) for how to format of the next 2 options.**

data.start_script: Run a script to start an unavailable Plex client
data.keyword_replace: Replace keywords or phrases with your own
data.jump_f: Default jump forward amount in seconds.
data.jump_b: Default jump backward amount in seconds.
